contentList.content: Overcome or be consumed, then another bearer will take their place. And another.

This sword's magical powers only function if it's <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="WEAPON_BOND">Bound</LSTag> to an Eldritch Knight or is a Warlock's <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="PACT_BLADE">Pact Weapon</LSTag>.
Red energy shines across the weapon's surface. Deals an additional [1].

When you land a <LSTag Tooltip="CriticalHit">Critical Hit</LSTag> or kill a target with a <LSTag Tooltip="MeleeWeaponAttack">melee weapon attack</LSTag>, you can cast <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="IE_Target_ImmolateEcho">Immolate Echo</LSTag> as a <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="BonusActionPoint">bonus action</LSTag> that turn.
As a bonus action, throw a blast of energy siphoned from the vitality of your enemies, damaging each creature it hits.
Can cast <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="IE_Target_ImmolateEcho">Immolate Echo</LSTag> as a bonus action.
This ritual staff emanates with cold crackling energy, said to be a Religious Implement for Shamans of the Storm Lord.
If the wearer is standing on a ice or lightning surface, they gain [1] AC.
Swipe at a creature with the power of the storm to knock it <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="PRONE">Prone</LSTag>.
Bring fourth the reign of the dragons.
This weapon ignores <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistance</LSTag> to Acid, Poison, Cold, Fire, and Lightning damage.
When you miss an attack, you deal [1] Acid, Poison, Cold, Fire, and Lightning anyway.
This dragon visage channels the blessing of the Dragon Queen, Tiamat.
Enemies within [1] of you take [2] Acid, Poison, Cold, Fire, and Lightning damage.
Enemies ending their turn within [1] of you take [2] Acid, Poison, Cold, Fire, and Lightning damage.
Target takes [2] Acid, Poison, Cold, Fire, and Lightning damage at the end of it's turn.
Drink in the power of the Gods and wield their power.
Weapon attacks deal an additional [1] per <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="SorceryPoint">Sorcery Point</LSTag>
Defeating a target with this weapon restores a <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="SorceryPoint">Sorcery Point</LSTag>
Infuse your strike with the blade's hunger, dealing [1] + an additional [2] damage.
The ring's gem shines with potential, ready to empower oneself upon empowering others.
Whenever an attack inflicts a condition, Gain [1] turns of <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MAG_ZOC_FORCE_CONDUIT">Force Conduit</LSTag>.
The power of Talo's destruction vibrates through your finger.
When the wearer defeats an enemy, gain [1] <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MAG_CHARGED_LIGHTNING">Lightning Charges</LSTag>.
A discarded ring. A prayer is inscribed on the inside reading, "I spin thy web of chaos, Mother, I spin it in your name - let not the threads unravel"
Your attacks ignore <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistance</LSTag> to Poison damage.
Upon taking damage, reflect [1] to the attacker.

A mysterious sword is lodged in this creature imbuing it with nefarious magic. Target gains <LSTag Type="Pasive" Tooltip="IE_Force_Reprisal">Force Reprisal</LSTag> and <LSTag Type="Passive" Tooltip="MAG_Critical_Force_Critical_Passive">Craterous Wounds</LSTag>
Produce a terrifying moan and <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="FEARED">Fear</LSTag> nearby creatures.
Produce a nauseating moan and <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="HAG_WELL_BAD">Nauseate</LSTag> nearby creatures.
Target a stuporing moan towards a creature, <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="HOLD_PERSON">Holding</LSTag> it.

Can <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_Multiattack_Cloaker">Multiattack</LSTag> if the target is <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="FRIGHTENED">Frightened</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="HAG_WELL_BAD">Nauseated</LSTag>, or <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="FEARED">Feared</LSTag>
Call for aid from the diety of destruction.
Talos has answered your call! Target is infused with the destructive power of storms.
Physical damage is reflected back as thunder damage.
